column1: #text=The thorax or chest ( Greek : θώραξ , Latin : thorax ) is a part of the anatomy of humans and various other animals located between the neck and the abdomen . [ 1][2]The thorax includes the thoracic cavity and the thoracic wall . It contains organs including the heart , lungs and thymus gland , as well as muscles and various other internal structures . Many diseases may affect the chest , and one of the most common symptoms is chest pain
